```{r, comment = ""}
library(kableExtra)
df <- read.csv('data/data.csv')

#check data

#change data types

df$urgency <- as.factor(df$urgency)
#check data
head(df)%>%
kable()%>%
kable_styling(c("striped", "hover", "condensed", "responsive")) %>%
scroll_box(width = "100%")

```
